reviews.review_msg: Amazing! It's obvious how much Cecile wants students to succeed and properly learn French, as she is so kind, always has an explanation for questions, and creates a really fun and engaging learning environment. Make sure to do the assigned homework and show up to class ready to participate, and you will do just fine!

Cecile is a very good teacher. Her classes can be a bit difficult as she may go through new concepts quickly, but if you work hard you can do well. I would have no problem taking another class with her
Good professor, helps students succeed is accessible outside class hours.

Took her online while pandemic and she was such a caring prof. Very accessible outside of class and tried to engage us the best she could. Most students had their cameras off and didnt even try or participate when she asked a question, which I felt bad for her, cause she sometimes just felt that she was talking alone. But such a sweetheart!

Super caring prof, she kept checking in with us to see how we were doing. You could tell she was trying to get us engaged even though most of the time she was just talking to blank screens. All materials were prepared by her on Canvas so no need to buy textbook (not sure if it was bc we were online though). Expects participation during lessons.
Cecile is really nice, and she's very passionate about teaching.
Incredibly hard to work with. Always late to class, never prepared. Hated this class.
She is genuinely such a wonderful human love her so much and makes beginner french fun
Wonderful and sweet professor, willing to help far beyond any other profs ever, kindest woman I know, please take this class if you get a chance with her! If you do the homework, you can get an A.
She is a really great teacher. She's funny, nice, caring and she explains the material really well :)
Cécile is a wonderful professor. She is understanding and always available for help. Very fair marker. Highly recommend taking classes with her.
Great prof. Very helpful, very clear and a very fair marker. Super understanding and just all around awesome.
Always late.... boring... such a useless class.  Won't ever take classes with her.

An excellent prof, very helpful, organized, enthusiastic about the material, explains material clearly.  The exams are fair, just need to study and attend class.  Overall, excellent - I'd highly recommend choosing any class she instructs.
Never made it to a class on time, which I find incredibly off-putting. Spent more time focusing on useless examples, rather than actually explaining the grammatical concept.
She's a very kind hearted prof. She is always there to help if you need it and is always looking out for her students. Only down fall always late but overall very good :)

Class with her was so fun. I laughed the most in her class. The class is very comfortable. It focuses a lot on grammar, which sucks, but the atmosphere during classtime made up for it. She is always late (5-10 minutes), but only because she has another class before. She is very French, very funny, very fun. Great class.

She's always late- without fail. its ok because im always late too, but that might bother other people. i dont think she's anything special- it doesnt feel like she puts any extra effort in but shes nice. she doesn't ever hand anything back like writing exercies so you don't really know how you're doing. she's not very inspiring.
She's wonderful.  She has a great personality and really wants students to learn in a comfortable environment.  She's patient & beautiful.  Basically I'm in love with her.

She is a great teacher! I feel so lucky that I had my first French course with her. You know how important your first language teacher is. If you wanna learn French, don't hesitate to take it with her. She is very organized, patient and she also has such a great personality.
Don't make her mad.She has no favorites except people who are interested & doing well in written work. She's okay.She doesn't like to go overtime in teaching, so that's good. Go with her alright.
